title: Look inside: the story of a project
creator_credit: Document Film Services and Gibbs Films
brief_description: Intended for showing to primary school children before embarking on a project about the mouth. The films includes highlights of the Dorset primary school children’s project on dental health featured in the companion film “Out of the Mouths”.
